h2_title: The Scorpionlord Boss - Purple Cloud Mountain
content: Just after the Bounds of Deity's Abode Keeper's Shrine, you can find the Scorpionlord. Go near the building that he protects and smash the pots, and he'll jump down for a fight. As you might expect, anything that will help you against poison resistance will help you against him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Scorpionlord Boss - Purple Cloud Mountain'.
The content is as follows:
Just after the Bounds of Deity's Abode Keeper's Shrine, you can find the Scorpionlord. Go near the building that he protects and smash the pots, and he'll jump down for a fight. As you might expect, anything that will help you against poison resistance will help you against him.
